name: SRTextInputSession.SessionType
desc: Methods to input text during a session.

items.name: case dictation
items.desc: Indicates that the session contains spoken text.

items.name: case keyboard
items.desc: Indicates that the session contains text from keyboard input.

items.name: case pencil
items.desc: Indicates that the session contains text drawn with Apple Pencil.

items.name: case thirdPartyKeyboard
items.desc: Indicates that the session contains text from a third-party keyboard.
